en.title: Kitten Vaccination Schedule: Timing and Types Explained
en.content:
Once you bring a kitten home, vaccinations are essential for protecting their health. This article explains the kitten vaccination schedule and important considerations.

Types of Kitten Vaccines

3-in-1 Combination Vaccine (Core Vaccine)

This vaccine prevents three infectious diseases: feline viral rhinotracheitis, feline calicivirus infection, and feline panleukopenia. It is the basic vaccine recommended for all cats.

5-in-1 Combination Vaccine

In addition to the three core diseases, this includes feline leukemia virus (FeLV) and feline chlamydia infection. It is recommended for cats that may go outdoors or live in multi-cat households.

Recommended Vaccination Schedule

AgeVaccination
Around 8 weeks1st combination vaccine
Around 12 weeks2nd combination vaccine
Around 16 weeks3rd dose (if needed)
1 yearBooster shot
ThereafterBoosters every 1-3 years

*The vaccination schedule may vary based on your veterinarian's assessment. It is adjusted according to the kitten's health condition and age.

Precautions After Vaccination

Keep your kitten calm after vaccination and avoid vigorous exercise or bathing. Mild side effects (lethargy, reduced appetite, swelling at the injection site) may occasionally occur but typically resolve within 1-2 days. Consult your veterinarian if concerning symptoms persist.

Fuluck Cattery's Vaccination Policy

At Fuluck Cattery, we administer vaccinations, health checks, and virus testing before handover. All vaccination records are provided in writing at the time of delivery.

zh.title: 幼猫疫苗接种时间表：接种时期与种类详解
zh.content:
迎接幼猫回家后，疫苗接种是保护其健康的重要环节。本文将为您详细讲解幼猫的疫苗接种时间表及注意事项。

幼猫疫苗的种类

三联疫苗（核心疫苗）

可预防三种传染病：猫病毒性鼻气管炎、猫杯状病毒感染症和猫泛白细胞减少症。这是所有猫都建议接种的基础疫苗。

五联疫苗

在三联疫苗的基础上，增加了猫白血病病毒（FeLV）和猫衣原体感染症的预防。适用于可能外出或多猫家庭的猫。

建议接种时间表

月龄接种内容
出生后约8周第1次联合疫苗
出生后约12周第2次联合疫苗
出生后约16周第3次（根据需要）
1岁加强接种
之后每1-3年追加接种

※接种时间表可能因兽医的判断而有所不同，会根据幼猫的健康状况和月龄进行调整。

接种后的注意事项

接种后请让幼猫保持安静，避免剧烈运动和洗澡。偶尔可能出现轻微的不良反应（精神不振、食欲下降、接种部位肿胀），但大多数会在1-2天内恢复。如果出现持续的异常症状，请咨询兽医。

福楽猫舍的疫苗管理

福楽猫舍在交付幼猫前会完成疫苗接种、健康检查和病毒检测。所有接种记录都会在交付时以书面形式提供。
